entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
